import React, { useState } from "react"; import SocialIcons from "./SocialIcons"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Header() { const [navbarOpen, setnavbarOpen] = useState(false); const location = useLocation(); return ( <>

My logo
    setnavbarOpen(!navbarOpen)} className={`fixed left-0 right-0 min-h-screen bg-gray-800 text-white font-light pt-10 text-4xl md:text-base space-y-8 p-4 transition duration-200 transform ${ navbarOpen ? "translate-y-0" : "translate-y-full" } md:relative md:flex md:min-h-0 md:space-y-0 md:space-x-6 md:p-0 md:translate-y-0`} >
  • {location.pathname !== "/" ? ( <> HOME ) : ( <> HOME )}
  • {location.pathname !== "/" ? ( <> ABOUT US ) : ( <> ABOUT US )}
  • {location.pathname !== "/" ? ( <> MESSAGES ) : ( <> MESSAGES )}
  • MINISTRIES
  • NEXT STEPS
  • GIVE
  • CONTACT
); }
